description: Braving the wind? Put comfort first with their Men’s Active Fleece Wind Tight. The stretchy knit fabric puts soft-brushed Merino wool next to skin while a durable, windproof front panel fights the elements. The slim fit lets you move without needing to adjust, plus ankle zips for extra breathing room. And it’s got reflective elements.
name: Smartwool Active Fleece Wind Tights - Mens

specs.value: 53% Merino Wool, 47% TENCEL™ Lyocell. Exclusive of Decoration
